Ingredients.4: 5 tablespoons rolled oats, or more as needed

Ingredients.5: 4 tablespoons oil, or more as needed

Ingredients.6: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Peel potatoes and finely grate. Set grated potatoes onto a clean kitchen towel, twist to close, and press most of the liquid out of the potatoes, leaving only a little moisture.

Directions.2: Mix pressed potatoes, onion, egg, and oats in a large bowl and season with salt and pepper.

Directions.3: Heat oil in a large skillet. Shape small potato pancakes with 2 spoons out of the potato mixture and set into the hot oil. Bake in batches until browned, 3 to 5 minutes per side, adding more oil as necessary. Drain on paper towels before serving.
